Item.method_code:
Dim myInnovator = Me.newInnovator() Dim SQL As String
SQL = "delete from PART_BOM" Dim result = myInnovator.applySql(SQL) If result.isError() Then Return result End If
SQL = "delete from PART_CAD" result = myInnovator.applySql(SQL) If result.isError() Then Return result End If
SQL = "delete from CAD_PART" result = myInnovator.applySql(SQL) If result.isError() Then Return result End If
SQL = "delete from CAD_FILE" result = myInnovator.applySql(SQL) If result.isError() Then Return result End If
SQL = "delete from CAD_STRUCTURE" result = myInnovator.applySql(SQL) If result.isError() Then Return result End If
SQL = "delete from CAD_CHANGES" result = myInnovator.applySql(SQL) If result.isError() Then Return result End If
SQL = "delete from CAD_PARENT" result = myInnovator.applySql(SQL) If result.isError() Then Return result End If
SQL = "delete from LOCATED" result = myInnovator.applySql(SQL) If result.isError() Then Return result End If
SQL = "delete from [file] where id not in (select related_id from databaseupgradelogfile) " result = myInnovator.applySql(SQL) If result.isError() Then Return result End If
SQL = "delete from PART" result = myInnovator.applySql(SQL) If result.isError() Then Return result End If
SQL = "delete from CAD" result = myInnovator.applySql(SQL) If result.isError() Then Return result End If
Return myInnovator.newResult("OK")
Item.name: xplm_remove_all
